text: Atahpara musa tamra sampradayera kache phire gelena krad'dha o anutapta abasthaya. Tini balalenah he amara sampradaya, tomadera palanakarta ki tomaderake ekati uttama pratisruti denani? Tabe ki pratisrutira samayakala tomadera kache dirgha hayeche, na tomara ceyecha ye, tomadera upara tomadera palanakartara krodha neme asuka, ye karane tomara amara sathe krta oyada bhanga karale
